Can: "I have to look forward & I don’t have to think about that. I have to enjoy playing football again & then hopefully I’ll start better."

Can on Lallana: "Adam is a very important and good player for us, but now us midfield players have to step up, everybody has to step up."

Can: "Everybody’s looking forward to this season, everybody wants to play in the Champions League, of course."

Can: "Hoffenheim will be a very tough game but our target is to win those games and to play in the Champions League."

The Brazilian handed in a transfer request today in order to push through a move to Barcelona, but the Sky Sports pundit does not think that will change anything as far as his former club are concerned.

"It would be foolish if they [FSG] went back on that now," he told SSN after the club's owners had ruled out Coutinho's exit.
